Title: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE PERFORMANCE BY THE SUPERINTENDENT OF INTERISLAND TRANSPORTATION OF THE DUTIES HERETOFORE PERFORMED BY THE PURCHASING1 AGENT IN THE MATTER OF TRANSPORTATION FOR OFFICIALS AND EMPLOYEES OF THE GOVERNMENT.
Data:
[ Act No. 1414, November 29, 1905 ]
AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE PERFORMANCE BY THE SUPERINTENDENT OF INTERISLAND TRANSPORTATION OF THE DUTIES HERETOFORE PERFORMED BY THE PURCHASING1 AGENT IN THE MATTER OF TRANSPORTATION FOR OFFICIALS AND EMPLOYEES OF THE GOVERNMENT.
By authority of the United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Commission, that:
Section 1. All of the duties which heretofore pertained to the Purchasing Agent in the matter of transportation for officials and employees of the Government from one point to another in the Islands, shall be performed by the Superintendent of Interisland Transportation after the dale of the passage of this Act, and section eight of Act Numbered One hundred and ninety-eight, as amended, is hereby further amended in so far as may be necessary to give effect to this provision.
Section 21a—àphi1. The public good requiring the speedy enactment of this bill, the passage of the same is hereby expedited in accordance with section two of "An Act prescribing the order of procedure by the Commission in the enactment of lavs." passed September twenty-sixth, nineteen hundred.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, November 29, 1905.
